title: Taraji P Henson and Tracie Jenkins Interview and More
itunes:title: Taraji P Henson and Tracie Jenkins Interview and More
description:
Tuesday 9/25 - Today on the show we had Taraji P Henson and her best friend Tracie Jenkins stop by where they spoke about their foundation the "Boris Lawrence Henson Foundation", in honor of her deceased father. They also opened up the conversation about mental health, anxiety and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to everyone using the Nike logo as the new symbol for black power. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners ghosted on someone like Nathan did to Issa on Insecure. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 9/25 - Today on the show we had Taraji P Henson and her best friend Tracie Jenkins stop by where they spoke about their foundation the "Boris Lawrence Henson Foundation", in honor of her deceased father. They also opened up the conversation about mental health, anxiety and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to everyone using the Nike logo as the new symbol for black power. Moreover, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners ghosted on someone like Nathan did to Issa on Insecure. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
